Humans are visual creatures. Thus, visualization is one of the most important tools for conveying information and data scientists should be adapt at selecting appropriate visualizations. 

## Which plot is appropriate?

Choosing an appropriate plot for a given set of data can be hard because there are so many types of plots such as scatter plots, box plots, and histograms. Fortunately, I have created an [overview of the most important plots, when they are appropriate, and how they can be used in R](/tags/plot/).
